alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 28 at 6:44PM MDT until August 29 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TO 8 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...A squall line is expected to move from south to north across the region and bring strong southerly winds sustained 15 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. Isolated severe thunderstorms with the squall line or behind it could produce gusts in excess of 55 mph. Waves of 2 to 4 feet are expected with the winds on Flathead Lake. * WHERE...Flathead/Mission Valleys. * WHEN...From 3 PM to 8 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Small craft on Flathead Lake could be surprised and overtaken by the wind and waves. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.
